description: This file contains functions for mapping and normalizing raw Confluence API responses into a standardized internal schema. It includes mapping raw page and space data, as well as functions for normalizing search results and create page responses.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] map_page(raw: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Maps raw Confluence page data to a normalized structure.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] map_space(raw: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Maps raw Confluence space data to a normalized structure.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] normalize_search_pages(raw_pages: List[Dict[str, Any]], page: int = 1, per_page: int = 10, next_cursor: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Normalizes a list of raw Confluence page data into a structured result with paging info.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] normalize_create_page(raw_page: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Normalizes the response of creating a Confluence page into a standard format.

ctags.name: normalize_search_pages
ctags.pattern: /^def normalize_search_pages(raw_pages: List[Dict[str, Any]], page: int = 1, per_page: int = 10, n/
ctags.signature: (raw_pages: List[Dict[str, Any]], page: int = 1, per_page: int = 10, next_cursor: Optional[str] = None)
